drupalNodeEvent.title: East Asian Digital Scholarship Community Hour

field_description.processed: The East Asian Digital Scholarship Community Hour is an experimental and casual community-building event. It aims to provide a platform for scholars, graduate students, in particular, to share their ideas, skills, big and small projects, and learn from each other. The event will be one hour in length, 40 minutes for presentations, and 20 minutes for discussion. If you are interested in presenting, please fill in the Google Form (https://link.ws/EADSCH-Present). Otherwise, you are welcome to participate as an audience member.
